parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Roads and Airports

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Find the road segments connected to the given road segment.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Pedestrian roads such as <tt>"TRAIL"</tt>s are missing connection information by design, therefore basic command will return empty array for those. Use the alternative syntax to return pedestrian roads.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''roadsConnectedTo''' roadSegment

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> roadSegment: [[Object]] - road segment

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s - connected road segments

</value></part><part><name>s2 </name>=<value> [[roadsConnectedTo]] [roadSegment, extended] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.99.146461</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> roadSegment: [[Object]] - road segment

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> extended: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[false]]) when [[true]], performs a more thorough search on top of base behaviour, slower but returns pedestrian and other missing road segments

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s - connected road segments

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_road = ([[player]] [[nearRoads]] 50) [[select]] 0;
_connectedRoads = [[roadsConnectedTo]] _road;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_road = ([[player]] [[nearRoads]] 50) [[select]] 0;
_connectedRoadsIncPedestrian = [[roadsConnectedTo]] [_road, [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[nearRoads]], [[isOnRoad]], [[roadAt]], [[surfaceIsWater]], [[getRoadInfo]], [[nearestTerrainObjects]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
